website_summaries.verdict: If you are comfortable with the concept of exclusively playing digitally downloadable games, this is the most cost-effective way to jump straight into a mammoth gaming library, especially if you have Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Live.
pros: Xbox One S model with 1TB of internal memory
Includes Minecraft, Sea of Thieves, and Forza Horizon 3
Most affordable Xbox One console available
cons: This All-Digital Xbox One S does not include a disc drive, and it is unable to play game, DVD, or Blu-ray discs

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with the digital only Xbox great value for console the 3 games included and a month worth of Xbox gold best purchase ever made,would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: My son says it might be one of the greatest gift ever
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox One S All-Digital Edition has been a wonderful gift to my son.He cannot stop playing with his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Naveed U Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy it. It is junk
customer_reviews.text: It is the worst product I have ever received it dont load it is slow and a waste of money I sent $105 of a hotspot for ot to work and it dont and it is the worst it has been loading all day and has not reached one GB of what it need to load the game and it need 65 GB. It hold 700 GB so there is no problem

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old little brother because my parents have not gotten him a switch yet, in fact he was still playing the Wii my family retired after we got chrome casts to watch Netflix. The lack of a disk drive puts me at bay since I know the feeling of a single scratch putting my favorite game out of service. Now I just share my game library and Gold subscription with his Xbox and my own. P.S. It was not cheaper than buying a console with a disk drive, I just wanted my brother to have something new. BEST BIG BRO EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Really? Whose bright idea was it to make this garbage? Gen X or millennials? Sorry I like to have to insert (😏) my games into the concole. This world is doomed of this is our future.
customer_reviews.author: user1987

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good...Updated
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and the shipping packaging was adequate for the product. I did unbox the item and nothing appears damaged and product also appears new as promised. I have yet to connect it so more to come. I will amend review once I try the product and if all checks out, 4* will be going to 5*. Update...finally had a chance to connect the XBOX. Works perfectly and came with all of the digital redemption codes as promised. This was the cheapest price I found online and well worth the money! Now I just need to get used to having no disc option but shouldn’t be a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Bidniuk

customer_reviews.title: $200 best deal all year
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his console. All digital is the best no more scratched CDs.
customer_reviews.author: tonya5

customer_reviews.title: X-eeded my X-pectations.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to get used to I admit, but I have access to various Microsoft games, including Banjo-Tooie one of my all time personal favorites. I couldn’t think of any games I wanted on a physical Xbox One disc, so this device was more suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger100M

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this if you are tired of dealing with discs! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I am new to an Xbox.... always had a PlayStation. I was a bit skeptical with it being totally digital and no discs. I signed up for the free months of the Game Pass Ultimate and extended it for like an extra $2. So I am covered through January. Pretty awesome. I am very much enjoying my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good price for an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It's an Xbox One S Digital; came in a clean undamaged box, works as expected. The price at the time I purchased was very good.

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect

Every code worked, and 1 month of live was included! This is a must buy if you’re in the market for all digital counsel! (That means no disk)!!!

Definitely ruined the excitement

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy

product_meta.title: Xbox One S All-Digital Edition (Discontinued)
product_meta.description: The best value in games and entertainment. Go all digital with the Xbox One S All-Digital Edition and enjoy disc-free gaming. Build a library of digital games in the cloud that goes where you go, along with your saves, and pre-install upcoming games so you're ready to play the moment they launch.
feature_bullets: Go all digital with the Xbox One S All Digital Edition and enjoy disc free gaming

Bundle includes*: 1TB Xbox One S All Digital Edition Console (Disc free Gaming), wireless controller, a 1 Month Xbox Live Gold subscription, and download codes for Minecraft, Forza Horizon 3, and Sea of Thieves. (Sea of Thieves requires an Xbox Live Gold subscription, sold separately)
Pick up where you left off on another Xbox One or Windows 10 PC with Xbox Play Anywhere titles like Crackdown 3 and Gears Of War 4
Your games and saves travel with you: just sign in on any Xbox One with your Microsoft Account and you're ready to go. Stream your game play on Mixer with the touch of a button
Does not play physical discs. Games are downloaded and ready to play when you are; no need to worry about discs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars971 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
